trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_000<tab>Well met, traveler. You've come to the Hortorium, the Crystarium's center for agricultural research. We strive to improve our ability to grow crops by developing new fertilizers and cultivation techniques.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_010<tab>Oh, greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. The chief hasn't been making a nuisance of herself, I hope? Be sure to let me know if she has─I'll give her a piece of my mind.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_020<tab>I must admit, it's quite exciting to study this mystery creature. But unlike the chief, you won't find me derelict in my duties.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_030<tab>Mao is usually a sensible sort, but his respect for the chief got the better of him. I pray he's learned his lesson.

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_031<tab>While I understand their passion for the samiel, they can't well find the creature if they're dead. And when they go charging off blindly, it falls to me to rein them in. <sigh>

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER4SUB1_00578_YALANA_000_040<tab>Oh, greetings, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm pleased to report that our study of the samiel proceeds apace. Why, just the other day we discovered eggshells over in Kholusia!
